The mynd and exposition of that excellente learned man Martyn Bucer, vppon these wordes of S. Mathew: Woo be to the wordle [sic] bycause of offences. Math. xviij. Faythfully translated in to Englishe, by a faythfull brother, with certayne obiections [and] answeres to the same Bucer, Martin, 1491-1551.
[56] p.
[By E. van der Erve], Printed at Emden : 1566.
Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-D⁴, A-C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
